Public Types

enum  GlobalSceneStatus { PreLoadingObjects, PostLoadingObjects, PreDestroyingObjects, PostDestroyingObjects }
 Enumeration for informing the ISystemScene on what is occuring.

Pre and post loading are used to inform when the framework being and ends completely loading a scene.

Pre and post destroying are used to inform when the framework being and ends completely destroying a scene.

Detailed Description

ISystemScene is an interface class for managing a scene or scenes in a system.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Interface::ISystemScene::GlobalSceneStatus

Enumeration for informing the ISystemScene on what is occuring.

Pre and post loading are used to inform when the framework being and ends completely loading a scene.

Pre and post destroying are used to inform when the framework being and ends completely destroying a scene.

.

virtual System::Type Interface::ISystemScene::GetSystemType ( void   )  [pure virtual]

Gets the system type for this system scene.

This is a shortcut to getting the system type w/o having to go the system first.

Returns:
